title: Still no Oceanic server for Linux results?
body:
Just wondered if anyone has figured out how to run LoL on Linux in the Oceanic server??
Using PlayOnLinux but there's only a US and 2 EU servers.
Thanks in advanced if anyone can help!

replies.body:
While **we don't offer official support for Linux**, I wanted to hop in here and give you some things to try. If these tips don't work, then, unfortunately, I won't be able to assist further.

First, you may be able to simply change your region to Oceania after the patcher comes up. Seems pretty simple, but I thought I'd mention it just in case. Secondly, you may be able to hop into your RADS System folder and make some configuration changes that will give you access to Oceania. Bear in mind, I've never used playonlinux, so I'm not sure if this is possible.

If you're able to access your the league install folder, you can find the RADS System through **Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\System** and you can make the following changes:
> **Edit LAUNCHER.CFG**
 
>* *change* the first line to **airConfigProject = lol_air_client_config_oc1**

> **Edit LOCALE.CFG**
>* *change* the first line  to **locale = en_au**

> **EDIT SYSTEM.CFG**

>*  *change* the third line to **Region = OC1**

Let me know if you have any questions.
